parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: List of scheduled action filters. (dict) --- A set of elements to filter the returned scheduled actions. The type of element to filter. List of values. Compare if the value (of type defined by Name) equals an item in the list of scheduled actions. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The type of element to filter.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: List of values. Compare if the value (of type defined by Name) equals an item in the list of scheduled actions.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of response records to return in each call. If the number of remaining response records exceeds the specified MaxRecords value, a value is returned in a marker field of the response. You can retrieve the next set of records by retrying the command with the returned marker value. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional parameter that specifies the starting point to return a set of response records. When the results of a  DescribeScheduledActions request exceed the value specified in MaxRecords, Amazon Web Services returns a value in the Marker field of the response. You can retrieve the next set of response records by providing the returned marker value in the Marker parameter and retrying the request.

nested_items.name: ScheduledActions
nested_items.description: List of retrieved scheduled actions.

nested_items.name: ScheduledActionName
nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled action.

nested_items.name: TargetAction
nested_items.description: A JSON format string of the Amazon Redshift API operation with input parameters.

nested_items.name: ResizeCluster
nested_items.description: An action that runs a ResizeCluster API operation.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the cluster to resize.

nested_items.name: ClusterType
nested_items.description: The new cluster type for the specified cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The new node type for the nodes you are adding. If not specified, the cluster's current node type is used.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNodes
nested_items.description: The new number of nodes for the cluster. If not specified, the cluster's current number of nodes is used.

nested_items.name: Classic
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether the resize operation is using the classic resize process. If you don't provide this parameter or set the value to false, the resize type is elastic.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the reserved node.

nested_items.name: TargetReservedNodeOfferingId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the target reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: PauseCluster
nested_items.description: An action that runs a PauseCluster API operation.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster to be paused.

nested_items.name: ResumeCluster
nested_items.description: An action that runs a ResumeCluster API operation.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster to be resumed.

nested_items.name: Schedule
nested_items.description: The schedule for a one-time (at format) or recurring (cron format) scheduled action. Schedule invocations must be separated by at least one hour.

nested_items.name: IamRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role to assume to run the scheduled action. This IAM role must have permission to run the Amazon Redshift API operation in the scheduled action. This IAM role must allow the Amazon Redshift scheduler (Principal scheduler.redshift.amazonaws.com) to assume permissions on your behalf. For more information about the IAM role to use with the Amazon Redshift scheduler, see Using Identity-Based Policies for Amazon Redshift in the Amazon Redshift Cluster Management Guide.

nested_items.name: ScheduledActionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the scheduled action.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the scheduled action. For example, DISABLED.

nested_items.name: NextInvocations
nested_items.description: List of times when the scheduled action will run.
(datetime) ---

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time in UTC when the schedule is active. Before this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time in UTC when the schedule is no longer active. After this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.
